languages.text: {n}Хормейстер поднимает на вас перемазанное кровью лицо. Он еле слышно произносит:{/n} "Вы жестоки. Но я подчиняюсь Вашей Светлости".
languages.translation_comment: Затемнение, капелла возвращается в мирный стейт

traits.locale_text: {n}Хормейстер поднимает на вас перемазанное кровью лицо. Он еле слышно произносит:{/n} "Вы жестоки. Но я подчиняюсь Вашей Светлости".

languages.translation_comment: Затемнение, капелла возвращается в мирный стейт

languages.text: {n}The Choirmaster lifts up his blood-smeared face toward you. He says faintly,{/n} "You are cruel. But I bow to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s will."
languages.original_text: {n}Хормейстер поднимает на вас перемазанное кровью лицо. Он еле слышно произносит:{/n} "Вы жестоки. Но я подчиняюсь Вашей Светлости".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Choirmaster lifts up his blood-smeared face toward you. His words are barely audible.{/n} "You are cruel. But I bow to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s will."

{n}The Choirmaster lifts up his blood-smeared face toward you. He says faintly,{/n} "You are cruel. But I bow to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s will."
{n}The Choirmaster lifts up his blood-smeared face toward you. He says faintly,{/n} "You are cruel. But I bow to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s will."

languages.text: {n}El maestro del Coro alza su rostro ensangrentado en tu dirección. Dice en voz baja:{/n} «Es cruel, pero acato la voluntad de mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster lifts up his blood-smeared face toward you. He says faintly,{/n} "You are cruel. But I bow to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s will."

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro del Coro alza su rostro ensangrentado en tu dirección. Dice en voz baja:{/n} «Es cruel, pero acato la voluntad de mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}クワイアーマスターは、血に塗れた顔を上げてこちらを見る。かすれた声を絞りだした。{/n}「残酷な人だ。しかし、陛下の意志に従おう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster lifts up his blood-smeared face toward you. He says faintly,{/n} "You are cruel. But I bow to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s will."

traits.locale_text: {n}クワイアーマスターは、血に塗れた顔を上げてこちらを見る。かすれた声を絞りだした。{/n}「残酷な人だ。しかし、陛下の意志に従おう」

languages.text: {n}唱诗大师抬起血迹斑斑的脸看着你，有气无力地开了口。{/n}“您太残忍了，但我愿意服从您的意愿，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster lifts up his blood-smeared face toward you. He says faintly,{/n} "You are cruel. But I bow to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s will."

traits.locale_text: {n}唱诗大师抬起血迹斑斑的脸看着你，有气无力地开了口。{/n}“您太残忍了，但我愿意服从您的意愿，大人。”

languages.text: {n}Der Chormeister hebt sein blutverschmiertes Gesicht zu dir. Er sagt mit schwacher Stimme:{/n} "Ihr seid grausam. Doch ich verneige mich vor dem Willen Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster lifts up his blood-smeared face toward you. He says faintly,{/n} "You are cruel. But I bow to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Chormeister hebt sein blutverschmiertes Gesicht zu dir. Er sagt mit schwacher Stimme:{/n} "Ihr seid grausam. Doch ich verneige mich vor dem Willen Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Le maître de chœur lève vers vous son visage ensanglanté et répond d'une voix à peine audible :{/n} « Vous êtes bien {mf|cruel|cruelle}, mais je me soumets à la volonté de Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster lifts up his blood-smeared face toward you. He says faintly,{/n} "You are cruel. But I bow to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître de chœur lève vers vous son visage ensanglanté et répond d'une voix à peine audible :{/n} « Vous êtes bien {mf|cruel|cruelle}, mais je me soumets à la volonté de Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Koro Şefi, kana bulanmış yüzünü kaldırarak sana çeviriyor. Güç bela duyulan bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Zalimsiniz. Yine de {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin iradesine boyun eğeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster lifts up his blood-smeared face toward you. He says faintly,{/n} "You are cruel. But I bow to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s will."
